name: Pixelord
description:
The simplest click runner for a long distance. Avoid the traps, jump over the abysses, run as far as possible from the haunting danger and maybe at the end expects salvation. All control is just a click. Every second makes you run even faster.
- A lot of tricky traps.
- Dynamic environment.
- Pixel graphics.
- 8-bit music.
- A lot of action.
